data.eml:eml: A new species of Ypsolopha Latreille (Lepidoptera, Ypsolophidae) from the Andes of northern Chile

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Vargas, Hector A. (2018): A new species of Ypsolopha Latreille (Lepidoptera, Ypsolophidae) from the Andes of northern Chile. Nota Lepidopterologica 41 (2): 199-205, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/nl.41.28570, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/nl.41.28570
